text: Teraemi yathayathabharae akasasamuha arau prthirai srsti karaiche. Arau yidina te'om ka’ba, ‘ha’, tetiya'i seya hai yaba. Te'omra katha'i satya. Yidina sinata phum diya ha’ba se'idinara kartrtba kerala te'omrae'i. Adrsya arau prakasya bisaye teraemi paraijnata, arau te'om prajnamaya, sabisesa aragata
